quotes.author: George Bernard Shaw
quotes.text: There is no sincerer love than the love of food.

quotes.author: Paul Prudhomme
quotes.text: You don't need a silver fork to eat good food.

quotes.author: Mother Teresa
quotes.text: If you can't feed a hundred people, then feed just one.

quotes.author: Louise Fresco
quotes.text: Food, in the end, in our own tradition, is something holy. It's not about nutrients and calories. It's about sharing. It's about honesty. It's about identity.

quotes.author: Jamie Oliver
quotes.text: What I've enjoyed most, though, is meeting people who have a real interest in food and sharing ideas with them. Good food is a global thing and I find that there is always something new and amazing to learn - I love it!
